Articles.Content: I'm tired of calculating delta V by myself, and my results are never the exact. So, I want to get kerbal engineer so I can use the delta V readouts. However, I use a mac, and I haven't modded with KSP before, so how would I go about installing it on a mac?
I don't have a Mac, but the folder structure of KSP is probably the same on both.  You want to put the KER folder inside the GameData folder.
